summary: With 15 years of experience as a web developer, I specialize in creating dynamic, high-performing websites and mobile applications. My expertise spans across a wide array of technologies, including PHP, JavaScript, Node.js, React Native, and Next.js. I am passionate about building user-friendly, scalable solutions that meet the unique needs of each project.

experience.description: ABC Technologies is an established company dealing in Digital Services including Software, Web and Mobile Application development since 2012. Doing Full Stack in MERN, VueJs & Next.js. Mobile Apps in ReactNative & Flutter.
Worked as a full time freelancer from 2009 to 2012, delivering multiple successful projects for US and Austrian client which eventual led to start a full time office.
ABC Enterprises is a leading name in the field of Software and Application development, established since 2001. I started my actual application developer career in this company.

interests: Beyond my professional life, I have a deep interest in gaming, cricket, reading, and exploring the wonders of astrology and astronomy. I enjoy delving into the latest advancements in science, which often inspires my approach to technology and problem-solving in my work.Currently, I focus on web and mobile app development, using my skills to craft seamless digital experiences.

reference.address: 3801 PGA Blvd, Ste 600, Palm Beach Gardens FL 33410
